attributes.action: provide persons suffering with asthma free prescriptions to control their condition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
asthma medication is needed by asthma suffers much like diabetes medication is a must have for sufferers of the condition, without the inhalers asthma sufferers ,much like diabetes suffers could die. Diabetes medication after a certain type is free but Asthma medication is full prescription price.

I am not asking for all medication to asthma sufferes to be free of charge but the inhalers that help to keep them alive.
